column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Not sure whether to call myself a fan
column3: or an addict! Unbelievably good pastries. So far I've tried the lemon tart
column6: and kougin amman (sp?). The kougin amman was sublime. So buttery
column7: just the right amount of sweetness
column8: and the texture is hard to describe
column9: but really wonderful. Being from Pennsylvania
column10: sticky buns and me go way back
column11: including the Penn State favorite: grilled stickies. Chef Roy's sticky was in another league. The caramel -- wow! Sticky heaven!
